Name: Alcohol Empire
About the game: Alcohol Empire - unusual mixture of real-time strategy and card game. Use a variety of cards and a range of buildings you can buy or build to gain an advantage and defeat your opponents! However, do not forget about time - the huge pace of the game will not allow you to think through your moves for a long time in advance, you will have to act quickly in order to keep up with your opponents. Game Features: Access to three characters with already prepared decks of cards. Let's skip the tedious part of deck building and jump right into the fight. We're here for fun! Buy buildings belonging to other players, steal cards from them, strengthen your buildings or weaken enemy ones - everyone can find a strategy for themselves. The high pace of the game will not let you get bored, and the victory will depend not only on the quality, but also on the speed of decision-making. The original visual and sound design gives the game a unique charm.
